name: Fashion Nail Salon And Beauty Spa Games For Girls - Princess Manicure Makeover Design And Dress Up
name_original: Fashion Nail Salon And Beauty Spa Games For Girls - Princess Manicure Makeover Design And Dress Up
description:
Want to have a manicure? Come on, spice up your fingers with our Nail Salon!

Polish, decorate, clip, buff your nails and much more in this amazing dress up and makeup nail salon game!
Manicure virtual nails like a real nail salon! Start by choosing a skin tone.

NAIL BITING FEATURES
- Four different skin tones
- More Nail Sets , Jewelry and Sticker
- Unique Nail Shapes
- Rings to Make Your Fingers Shine
- Beautiful Wrist Bracelets
- More tattoo and tattoo color
- Various backgrounds available to switch
- Save and share your designs from the album

Take a photo as our cover girl.
Share your happiness with your friends, and you may also bring your favored creation to a manicurist!
More collections and most plentiful colors available to make all your ideas come true!
